max.candidates.label: Max. no. of candidates:
max.candidates.description: The maximum number of label candidates to be extracted from the training data.

max.len.label: Max. length (in words):
max.len.description: The maximum length of a topic label, in words.

min.cf.label: Min. label frequency:
min.cf.description: The minimum total occurrence of a collocation to be used as a topic label.

min.df.label: Min. document frequency:
min.df.description: The minimum number of documents in which a collocation needs to occur to be used as a topic label.

min.len.label: Min. length (in words):
min.len.description: The minimum length of a topic label, in words. If set to one, single words will be included in possible labels, although they are excluded in counting the maximum number of candidates.

mu.label: Î¼:
mu.description: A discriminative coefficient. Candidates with a high score on a specific topic and with a low score on other topics get a higher final score when this value is larger.

num.label: Number of topic labels:
num.description: The number of labels to be automatically generated for each topic. If set to zero, automated topic labeling is deactivated.

smoothing.label: Smoothing:
smoothing.description: A small value greater than zero for Laplace smoothing.

window.size.label: Window size:
window.size.description: The size of the sliding window for calculating co-occurrence. If zero, the whole document is used. Should be between 50 and 100 for long documents.
